name: comments_popup_link
about: Displays the link to the comments for the current post ID

name: comments_template
about: Loads the comment template specified in $file.

name: get_comments
about: Retrieve a list of comments and you can also return it's number only.

name: comment_open
about: Determines whether the current post is open for comments.

name: comments_number
about: Displays the language string for the number of comments the current post has.

name: comment_form
about: Outputs a complete commenting form for use within a template.
